text: Ne Omurumwa wabu nababoolela mbu; â€œNe toto eshimanyisio shiobwami bubwe ni okhubarerela lisanduku lilimwo eshiosia emioyo chienyu, eshirulanga khu Nyasaye wenyu omulesi, ne khulimwo nende akababu Musa balekha nende Harun, Abamalaika balichinganga. Toto mukano ebimanyisio bilimwo khwinywe nimuli mbu mwasuubila
